articles.author: Tom Warren
articles.title: Microsoft Office VBA macro block still going ahead soon - The Verge
articles.description: Microsoft is still planning to block Office VBA macros by default. The software maker rolled back planned changes last week, surprising IT admins who were preparing for the change.
articles.content:
Microsoft says its fully committed to making the change
Photo by Sam Byford / The Verge
Microsoft is still planning to block Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) macros by default in Office apps. Th… [+1556 chars]
